00023 void PriceManagement::newCharge(QString capacity, QString price)
00024 {
00025     QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00026     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00027     fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM Prices WHERE RoomCapacity = :capId");
00028     fetchquery.bindValue(":capId", capacity.toInt());
00029     fetchquery.exec();
00030 
00031     while(fetchquery.next())
00032     {
00033         QMessageBox::information(0,"Input Data Error", "This room capacity exists");
00034     }
00035 
00036     QSqlQuery query;
00037     query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00038 
00039     query.prepare("INSERT INTO Prices (RoomCapacity, Price) VALUES (:capId, :price)");
00040 
00041     query.bindValue(":capId", capacity.toInt());
00042     query.bindValue(":price", price.toDouble());
00043     query.exec();
00044 }

00052 void PriceManagement::deleteCharge(QString capacity)
00053 {
00054     QSqlQuery query;
00055     query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00056     query.prepare("delete from Prices where RoomCapacity = :capId");
00057     query.bindValue(":capId", capacity.toInt());
00058     query.exec();
00059 }

00066 void PriceManagement::editCharge(QString capacity, QString price)
00067 {
00068     QSqlQuery query;
00069     query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00070     query.prepare("UPDATE Prices SET Price = :price WHERE RoomCapacity = :capId");
00071     query.bindValue(":price", price.toDouble());
00072     query.bindValue(":capId", capacity.toInt());
00073     query.exec();
00074 }

00081 QMap<int, double> PriceManagement::fetchAllCharges()
00082 {
00083     QMap<int, double> charges;
00084     QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00085 
00086     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00087     fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM Prices");
00088     fetchquery.exec();
00089 
00094     while(fetchquery.next())
00095     {
00096         charges.insert (fetchquery.value(0).toInt(), fetchquery.value(1).toDouble());
00097     }
00098 
00099     return charges;
00100 }
